meanings.definition: A person who sends text messages.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a fast texters.
meanings.sent2: Texters often use emojis to express emotions.
meanings.sent3: The texters in our group chat always make me laugh with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of talkers, be a texters who listens.
meanings.sent5: The texters in the library were quietly typing away on their phones.

meanings.definition: The act of sending text messages.
meanings.sent1: Texters have made communication easier and faster.
meanings.sent2: I prefer texters over phone calls for quick messages.
meanings.sent3: The texters during the meeting were so distracting!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the screen like a skilled texters.
meanings.sent5: The texters on the bus were busy tapping on their phones.
